overview_of_class: We will continue our development of the essential concepts in solid state physics, including electron-electron interactions, screening, Hartree and Hartree-Fock aproximations, anharmonicity of lattice vibrations, phonons in metals, types of insulators and their dielectric properties, magnetic order and spin waves, and the Landau-Ginzburg theory of superconductivity. If time permits we will consider topics such as the Hubbard model, and open questions in magnetism.
name: Condensed-Matter Physics
title: WCAS PHYSICS 422-3-20 Condensed-Matter Physics
